post.text: We made a promise to these heroes. Veterans defend America, and America will defend you. #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

comment.author: Logan
comment.text: Wonder what country Donald J. Trump will attack. As with all your presidents, he will. Maybe Mexico if they don't build that wall.

replies.author: Eryn
replies.text: You know what I will attack!? Some morons full of crap all the time! He is against Iraq war! And he showed to the people many times!

replies.author: James
replies.text: He'll be to busy fixing our government & Making America Great Again.
